script: AddText "The concourse is clean, orderly, and unmistakably Federation—cargo lifts hum in regular intervals, and the UTFE emblem gleams from every customs checkpoint. Trade officials move with purpose between docks while contracted loaders work in modular sync to offload freighters. Digital kiosks track cargo flow with near-perfect precision. Occasional announcements remind crews to check their clearances before departure." marketFlavorTextColor

AddText "The concourse is compact but efficient, with UTFE banners displayed at regular intervals and modular containers lined in neat rows. Smaller freighters and licensed charters offload under the watch of quiet, organized inspection crews. Trade is subdued but consistent, and official signage reminds visitors that all docking windows are subject to review." marketFlavorTextColor

AddText "The concourse operates under reduced staffing, but the Federation banners still hang, flanked by automated inspection drones. Trade traffic is light, and the flow of cargo is carefully controlled through sealed lanes. Officials seem tense—every movement checked twice, every manifest verified aloud. A notice loop reminds visitors that temporary restrictions are in place 'for systemic integrity.'" marketFlavorTextColor

AddText "The concourse feels hollow, with flickering UTFE signage and half-manned checkpoints behind sealed barriers. Only a few ships dock—most under escort—and the offloading process is slow, tense, and watched by armed security. Clearance procedures have been replaced by spoken orders and ID scans at rifle-point. A repeating tone plays from damaged loudspeakers: 'Maintain corridor discipline. Your cooperation preserves stability.'" marketFlavorTextColor

text: Your record shows consistent alignment with Federation priorities. You are considered a trusted external agent, and access to high-level support or infrastructure may be granted with minimal oversight. Strategic planners reference your activity in favorable terms. Internal communications suggest you may be quietly treated as an unofficial extension of the system.

You are viewed as a valuable and reliable partner. UTFE personnel are encouraged to extend logistical or diplomatic courtesies when appropriate. Your presence is known, noted, and largely welcomed throughout most systems. Several branches consider your continued activity a net gain to regional operations.

Federation officers and trade coordinators recognize you as a positive force. While you hold no formal privileges, communication and access proceed with minimal resistance. You are seen as predictable and broadly beneficial. Informal paths may open in places where protocol allows discretion.

Relations are smooth, if not yet strategic. You are generally respected, occasionally referenced, and unlikely to face administrative resistance. Useful, but not yet vital. Given time or further alignment, this could develop into deeper access.

Your activities have raised neither concern nor confidence. Federation systems will process you efficiently, without favor or prejudice. Access is permitted, but nothing is extended beyond baseline protocols. Your name appears on no special lists—good or bad.

You are operating near the edge of tolerance. Patterns in your activity have prompted review, and while no direct action is warranted, internal advisories recommend caution. You are no longer overlooked. Interactions may be logged for further assessment.

Your presence is unwelcome across most Federation channels. You are blocked from standard access, and your movements are routinely logged. No aid is to be offered unless mandated by regulation. Crews are instructed to minimize contact unless required by law or fleet standing orders.

Your actions have harmed Federation assets or personnel, directly or through affiliation. Defensive protocols will be triggered upon detection, and you will receive no communication beyond operational necessity. You are treated as an immediate tactical risk. Where possible, response forces are granted autonomous authority.

Your actions have directly compromised the Federation’s integrity or personnel. Retaliatory efforts are likely already underway, and negotiation is no longer considered viable. There is no expectation of reconciliation. You and your $shipOrFleet are considered a threat worth dealing with now rather than later.

You wouldn't believe the damage they cause when they can bring themselves to apply technology to meet their goals. This one is hiding out in the $bcb_systemName, $bcb_dist light-years away, and has caused great personal offense."

"I shall provide a reward of $bcb_reward credits for taking care of this fanatic. You'd have $bcb_days days to complete the mission."

"Oh, delightful; another disgusting herd of space trash come to smear grime on everything they don't steal." $Post $personLastName frowns dramatically, "Well, we know how to treat the criminal element here, trust me on that. I'll have my subordinate handle the mess."
